items.sentence: How many seconds did it take Tom to do that?
How many months will it take Tom to do that?
I don't think that Tom will like this place.
Apparently Tom's father is into photography.
I think that Tom is a little too optimistic.
I spent all the money I had to buy the book.
I've got really bad reception at the moment.
Tom told me that his mother never loved him.
Rice prices are regulated by the government.
Turn off the lights when you leave the room.
Do you know where Tom is going to eat lunch?
I told Tom that I'd help him move his piano.
Have you decided what you'll do next summer?
Are you sure you don't want to come with me?
There are many senior citizens in this area.
I'll be leaving as soon as this job is done.
I wish that you wouldn't make so much noise.
I won't be able to solve this problem alone.
I complained about that, but it didn't help.
That's exactly why I can't take you with me.
